= Single Database for managing User Credentials =
Every Registered user information is stored in single database and used by multiple applications


database structure

user [ username, password, password_strength, encryption_key, is_encrypted, creation_date, lastModified_date ]

user_old_password [ username, password, creation_date, modified_date ]

user_company [ username, company, enabled, creation_date, lastModified_date, expiration_date]

user_roles [ username, role ]

role [ role, type, description ]
